channel.title: BitcoinZ Roadmap on BitcoinZ - Community-Driven Cryptocurrency
channel.description: Recent content in BitcoinZ Roadmap on BitcoinZ - Community-Driven Cryptocurrency

item.title: Mining Pool Integration
item.description:
# Mining Pool Integration

Major mining pools begin hosting BTCZ:

  • Mining4
  • Miningspeed
  • Equipool

This milestone marks a significant step in decentralizing BTCZ mining infrastructure and improving network security.

item.title: test!!
item.description: test!!

item.title: Android Wallet Launch
item.description: Android Wallet Launch

item.title: Voskcoin Video Coverage
item.description:
# Media Coverage

Major cryptocurrency influencer Voskcoin creates BTCZ video:

  • Comprehensive project explanation
  • Wide audience reach
  • Professional coverage
  • Enhanced visibility

This milestone brings significant media attention and exposure to the BTCZ project.
